main event: An unidentified object was sighted bouncing to the west in Klamath, Oregon, on August 15, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a child's head.,The sighting lasted for an unspecified length of time.,The source of the report included both civilian and military observations.,Weather conditions were clear with stars visible.,No definitive identification could be made, with suggestions that it might be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: William Morton, residing in Klamath Falls, Oregon
